00020         WorldState* loadScenario6()
00021         {
00022                 WorldState* state = new WorldState();
00023 
00024                 GameObject* background = new GameObject();
00025                 background->usesPhysics = false;
00026                 background->setSprite("Backgrounds\\background");
00027                 state->addBackgroundObject(background);
00028 
00029                 Ship* player = new Ship();
00030                 player->setSprite("Hulls\\Sample Hull");
00031                 player->isPlayer = true;
00032                 player->projectileBrain = &makeBoringBrain;
00033                 state->insertObject(player,point(100,300));
00034 
00035 
00036                 for (int i = 0 ; i< 55 ; i++)
00037                 {
00038                         Ship* opponent = new Ship();
00039                         opponent->displayHeading.set_degrees(180);
00040                         opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\drone");
00041                         opponent->HP = 50;
00042                         
00043 
00044                         opponent->projectileBrain = &makeSlowBoringBrain;
00045                         opponent->brain->addChild((new RepeatNode(-1))->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00046                                         ->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(RIGHT,.5,2000))
00047                                         ->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(DOWN,.5,1000))
00048                                         ->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(LEFT,.5,2000))
00049                                         ->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(DOWN,.5,1000))));
00050                         
00051                         ProbabilityNode* firing = new ProbabilityNode();
00052                         firing->addChild(new Fire(),1);
00053                         firing->addChild(new Cooldown(100),100);
00054                         opponent->brain->addChild((new RepeatNode(-1))->addChild(firing));
00055                                 
00056 
00057                         state->insertObject(opponent,point(50 + 50 * (i%11),50 + (50 * (i/11))));
00058                 }
00059                 return state;
00060         }
